statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data
SELECT id, date, profit FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > 10000
SELECT id, date, profit FROM financial_data WHERE expenses < 5000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, profit FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue, AVG(expenses) AS average_expenses FROM financial_data
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE revenue > expenses ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, date, profit FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT AVG(revenue) AS average_revenue, MAX(expenses) AS max_expenses FROM financial_data
SELECT id, revenue, expenses, profit FROM financial_data WHERE profit < 0 ORDER BY profit ASC
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE date < '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM historical_financial_data;
SELECT date, closing_price FROM historical_financial_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT stock_symbol, opening_price, closing_price FROM historical_financial_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT AVG(risk_score) AS average_risk_score, recommended_action FROM risk_analysis_results GROUP BY recommended_action;
SELECT MAX(volume) AS max_volume, MIN(volume) AS min_volume FROM historical_financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM historical_financial_data WHERE opening_price > 100 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price FROM historical_financial_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY closing_price ASC;
SELECT MAX(closing_price), MIN(opening_price) FROM historical_financial_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT h.stock_symbol, r.recommended_action FROM historical_financial_data h JOIN risk_analysis_results r ON h.stock_symbol = r.stock_symbol WHERE r.risk_score > 0.7;
SELECT AVG(opening_price), AVG(closing_price) FROM historical_financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT company_name, stock_price FROM financial_data WHERE stock_price > 1000;
SELECT company_name, stock_price FROM financial_data ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics WHERE beta < 1.5;
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM historical_events ORDER BY event_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, stock_price FROM financial_data WHERE stock_price > 100 ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT date, company_name, stock_price FROM financial_data WHERE company_name = 'Apple' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT company_name, market_cap FROM risk_metrics WHERE market_cap > 1000000 ORDER BY market_cap DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM historical_events ORDER BY event_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, asset_name, price FROM financial_data WHERE volume > 1000 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT factor_name, weight FROM risk_factors WHERE weight > 0.5 ORDER BY weight DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT analysis_id, date, risk_score FROM historical_analysis WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY risk_score DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT user_id, factor_name FROM user_preferences WHERE asset_name = 'Apple' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE price > 100 AND volume < 500
SELECT asset_name, price FROM financial_data WHERE date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT MAX(price) AS highest_price FROM financial_data
SELECT asset_name, SUM(volume) AS total_volume FROM financial_data GROUP BY asset_name
SELECT * FROM historical_analysis ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, closing_price FROM financial_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY closing_price ASC;
SELECT date, risk_rating FROM historical_returns WHERE return_rate > 8.5 AND risk_rating = 'high';
SELECT index_name, value FROM market_indices WHERE date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT stock_symbol, industry FROM company_info WHERE founded >= '2000-01-01';
SELECT date, closing_price, volume FROM financial_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM historical_returns WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY return_rate DESC;
SELECT index_name, value FROM market_indices WHERE date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT * FROM sector_performance WHERE sector_name = 'Technology' AND performance_score > 8 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT company_name, industry, founded FROM company_info WHERE industry LIKE '%Software%' ORDER BY founded DESC;
